alert.note: Alert for McLean; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 5:32PM CDT until April 30 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Woodford County in central Illinois... East central Tazewell County in central Illinois... Northwestern McLean County in central Illinois... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minier, or 15 miles west of Bloomington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Danvers around 540 PM CDT. Carlock around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hudson, El Paso and Gridley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39 between mile markers 3 and 25. Interstate 74 between mile markers 114 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Illinois.
